abstract: For the sixth consecutive week, CBS averaged the most television viewers on Thursday thanks to solid ratings for “Survivor,” “CSI” and “Eleventh Hour.”
snippet: For the sixth consecutive week, CBS averaged the most television viewers on Thursday thanks to solid ratings for “Survivor,” “CSI” and “Eleventh Hour.”
lead_paragraph: For the sixth consecutive week, CBS averaged the most television viewers on Thursday thanks to solid ratings for “Survivor,” “CSI” and “Eleventh Hour.” According to Nielsen’s estimates, the three shows each led their respective time slots as “Survivor: Gabon” delivered 13 million viewers at 8 p.m., “CSI” drew 18.9 million at 9 p.m., and “Eleventh Hour” garnered 11.7 million at 10 p.m.
